message: Primary bloat source identified: tool_result content fields in user messages. Observed 36KB content in single tool_result (line = 39KB total). Bloat pattern: Read tool results containing full file contents are logged verbatim.

DUAL STRATEGY RECOMMENDED: (1) Implement 8KB line truncation at read-time in get_agent_output [documented in truncation_strategy.md], AND (2) Reduce MCP coordination_info response sizes at source in update_agent_progress/report_agent_finding. Root cause is 35KB+ coordination_info in tool_results - agents don't need full state logged.

data.primary_recommendation: Read-time truncation: 8KB line limit, 2KB tool_result content, smart preview algorithm
data.secondary_recommendation: Reduce update_agent_progress response from 35KB to ~2KB (return only confirmation + recent_findings, not full coordination_info)
implementation_priority: Option A: Implement truncation (documented, ready to build)
Option B: Reduce MCP responses (simpler, fixes root cause)
